PRODUCT_NAME.description: Name or title of the product

PRODUCT_CODE.description: Unique code assigned to the product

PRODUCT_SKU.description: Stock keeping unit (SKU) of the product

DESCRIPTION.description: A description or brief information about the product

PRODUCT_FAMILY.description: The family or category the product belongs to

CURRENCY_CODE.description: The currency code used for pricing the product

DEFAULT_PRICE.description: The default price of the product

DATE_CREATED_UTC.description: The date and time when the product was created in UTC

DATE_UPDATED_UTC.description: The date and time when the product was last updated in UTC

CREATED_USER_ID.description: The ID of the user who created the product

OWNER_USER_ID.description: The ID of the user who owns the product

ACTIVE.description: Indicates if the product is currently active or not

CUSTOMFIELDS.description: Custom fields associated with the product

FIELD_NAME.description: The name of the custom field

FIELD_VALUE.description: The value of the custom field
